title: Questions about the snowdown your shop.
body:
I havn't opened my offers yet.

One of my favorite and most played champions has a skin that came back to the store at full price as part of the special offering of seasonal legacy skins.

Does your shop adjust it's offering based on skins owned when you open it?

Like are my 6 sale items already locked in and it makes no difference when I open the store or  do they change to offer you unowned skins? 

My plan is to buy buy the seasonal skin at full price from the store page and I'd hopefully be able to proc a different skin for that same champion in the your shop. Does this work or not?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, I don't have a lot of info beyond what's provided in the [Your Shop Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012568988-Your-Shop-FAQ) Based on that, the system uses your play history as one factor as well as other considerations:

> 
> "Discountbot uses your play history over the last 6 months to compare you to players with similar patterns, and creates deals that it thinks you will like. It looks at more than just your most-played champs, so your discounts won’t necessarily be limited to those champs. Hopefully you end up with a good variety.
> 
> If you haven’t played in the last 6 months, your selection will be much more randomized than someone who has played more lately."

The shop should only offer you unowned skins, so it won't give you a discount on a skin you already have.  There's no guarantee that you will get the content that you want specifically, but the deals should hopefully still be stellar!
